name: Atlantean Shinnok
description: A fallen elder god of Atlantis, corrupted by dark magic from the depths. His divine powers combined with abyssal corruption make him a devastating adversary.

abilities.name: Dark Bubble
abilities.description: Deals 610 + 100% Magical Damage as magical damage to the target.

abilities.name: Skeletal Barrier
abilities.description: Grants an ally (or self) a 1800 HP shield for 3 turns.

abilities.name: Magical Spheres
abilities.description: Launches 5 spheres dealing 200% Magical Damage each to random enemies.

passive.name: Shadow Protection
passive.description: Takes 50% less damage while an ally is alive.
